title: Changes in Real Time: Online Scene Change Detection with Multi-View Fusion
summary: Online Scene Change Detection (SCD) is an extremely challenging problem that requires an agent to detect relevant changes on the fly while observing the scene from unconstrained viewpoints. Existing online SCD methods are significantly less accurate than offline approaches.
